summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue Northwest, from West 57th Street to West 62nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9544 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
